root.name: Lock on: Flaming Cliffs 3
root.description: Lock on: Flaming Cliffs is building further on the existing versions and is integrated with the DCS World as purchasable module. (Requires a previous installation of Lock on: Modern Air Combat or Flaming Cliffs)As with all current DCS World modules, Flaming Cliffs 3 offers a wide array of customization and realistic features.FeaturesThe new F-15C Eagle features 6 degrees of freedom (6DOF) cockpit and model, along with a new campaign and missions.PlanesMiG-29A / MiG-29S FulcrumSu-27 / Su-33 FlankerSu-25 FrogfootF-15C EagleA-10A Thunderbolt IIMultiplayerLock on: Flaming Cliffs 3 integrates with all current DCS World modules and can be played with anyone owning any of these.System RequirementsOperating system: Windows XP, Vista or 7Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.0 GHzMemory: 3 GBFree hard disk space: 7 GBVideo: 512 MB RAM card, DirectX 9 - compatibleSound: DirectX 9.0c - compatibleRequires internet activation.
